Text: YYEESS!
DELIGHTFUL!
SEVENTH! COLUMN!
Phenomenal!
You're unstoppable!
Outstanding!
Look at them fall!
Fantastic work!
Three opponents down!
Yes! Three down!
Triple down!
Double down!
Two for one!
I'm so proud of you, Guardian, and I want, you to have this.
This is—uh, I don't have a medal for this! Hang on!
I CAN'T BELIEVE THAT [gasps] I don't have a medal for this! Hang on!
[laughs] Oh, no, I don't have a medal for this! Hang on!
Was that all of them? THAT WAS ALL OF THEM!!
That was inconceivable!
WHAT? WHAT?! HOW?!
Did you hear that? My soul just shivered.
OH NOOOO! [laughs]
Good!
[low chuckle]
I love it.
Nice.
Uh-oh.
Oh no! [laughs]
I want more, Guardian!
That can't be right. Really?
What do you expect me to do with that?
What? Where's my catharsis? BOO! BOOOOOO!
I'm, I'm not sure who to be angry at.
I'll admit—I didn't expect this.
I can't watch this. Win this already, would you?
JUST WIN THIS, GUARDIAN! OR I'LL SNAP OFF MY OTHER HORN.
Are you trying to kill me? Just win!
*laughs* You're scaring them! Turn this around!
THIS IS WHAT THEY CALL A RIGHTEOUS INFLICTION OF RETRIBUTION.
THEY BATTERED YOUR BODY, BUT THEY COULD NOT HARM YOUR SOUL! NOW CRUSH THEM!
You looked Death in his beady eyes, and you spat in them! YOU FIEND!
By the Hammer of Sol! I knew you wouldn't let me down!
*laughs* You don't know when to quit. I love it.
YES! You're either very brave or very foolish. I like you, Guardian.
I bet they didn't expect THAT!
Fight until there's nothing left!
Let them come! This is their fate!
Relax, Guardian. You're scaring them. They'll never want to match with you again.
I can't believe what I'm seeing!

What I wouldn’t give to fight again beyond the walls. I would tear out a Vex heart with my teeth, I would sear the Cabal with my burning Light, challenge the Fallen Kells to personal combat and scatter them, I—I’ve been watching too many Crucible matches.
Oh my. This is, this is beautiful. You continue to be my greatest success, Guardian.
Guardian to the right of you! Guardian to the left of you! Guardian in FRONT of you! VOLLEYED AND THUNDERED!
The recruits have no excuses. Look at you! At what one Guardian can do! With nothing but your Ghost, your weapon, and your Light!
The Iron Lords. Six Fronts. The Twilight Gap, where Lord Shaxx earned his name. NONE FELLED MORE GUARDIANS THAN YOU.
FIGHT FOREVER, Guardian!
With ten Hunters like you, I could make the frontier safe again!
Your killing intent is unmatched, Hunter!
With you in the field, no enemy can hide from us, Hunter!
Some people think I don't like Hunters. I don't. I LOVE THEM.
Your strength is an inspiration to us all, Titan!
With ten Titans like you, I could build all seven columns and shake the pillars to their core!
With you on the field, there isn't a border I could not push, Titan!
Call the Praxic Order! Call the Thanatonauts! The Gensym Scribes! Call EVERYONE—so they can witness you!
Who says Warlocks are better with books than with guns? OK, it was me. But I was lying. Rage is an excellent motivator.
With ten Warlocks like you, I could turn ideas into weapons!
First blood goes to you. They'll seek retribution for this.
Magnificent! Now stay focused.
Oh, the hounds of war are loose!
Oh, yes! The battle lines have been drawn!
I could feel that in my bones!
Your legend grows!
One after another!
Tell them to line up faster!
This is wonderful!
Now you're fighting with heart, Guardian!
This is amazing!
Hunters like you blaze a path for the rest of us!
I need a Hunter like you with the Redjacks!
You have my respect, Hunter.
I envy your strength, Titan.
You wage war like a true Titan!
Fought like a Titan of the First Pillar!
You made that look easy, Warlock.
Ikora would be proud of you, Warlock.
Your moments of clarity are weapons, Warlock.
THAT shut them down!
You shut the enemy down!
Your enemy can't kill if they're DEAD! Haha!
This is how it starts, Hunter! Nothing but cunning and wit to guide you!
It begins, Titan! Crush them like this every time!
Your time is now, Warlock! Write your legend with each opponent you defeat!
I wanted you to win, and you set the whole bloody world on fire. Good.
Your Light is blistering! It's no wonder gods fall before you.
Everything dies, Guardian. But when you're around, it happens so much faster!
I thought to myself, "Is that a miniature sun?" But no, it was you. Raining Light on your opponents. I love it.
I have prevented extinction-level events that were gentler than you. Fantastic work.
You should have heard the other team's feed. They thought it was the end of the world. But it was just you.
Cayde would have been proud of how you ran through that like it was a game. You sly bastard.
I haven't seen destruction on a scale like that since�f well, the last time you won.
You fought well. Nothing held back. As it should be. Though you could always throw more grenades.
I hope you cherish these opportunities to show the Crucible what your Light can do. I make sure new Guardians see all your feeds.
What's my favorite gun? Flaming hammers. Welcome to Mayhem!
There is no cowardice in hiding until you're supercharged. But I'll see it. I'll see it every time.
Show me everything, Guardian. No limits here!
You signed the waiver. Now explode each other. [laughs]
Arcite, bring me that haggis while I call this match? No, those are bullets. Never mind. I'll do it myself.
If you lose here, I'll tell you what you did wrong: You didn't throw enough grenades. You should be throwing grenades as I say this.
Mayhem simulates open war. Show me what you can do with no limits!
Mayhem is a coming together of friends. Now do as friends do—incinerate each other with your Light.
There can be poetry in destruction. Write me some poetry. Do it!
Do you hear that? It's not the sky falling. It's Mayhem.
Enjoy yourselves, Guardians
Good luck.
[Laughter] Time for battle!
How will you fare against utter chaos? [Laughter]
Destroy them with your Light!
Once more unto the breach!
A tie? In MAYHEM? What is wrong with you people? Throw more grenades!
So you lost. Don't let it upset you. This is Mayhem. Perhaps try throwing more grenades?
I'm sorry. There is no Redrix's Claymore for losing matches. But perhaps there should be. Arcite, grab a pen and paper. I have an idea.
Two fireteams of Guardians, head-to-head, with no limits on their Light. Someone was bound to lose. Make sure it's them next time.
Your Light means you're never truly dead. Embrace that and fight again.
So they beat you this time. But how many grenades did you throw? Huh? Did you count them? Really. Ask yourselves: "Did I throw all the grenades I could?"
Mayhem.
Your opponent is single now! Finish this!
Your partner's counting on you!
Your opponents lead. Catch up. I know you can!
Enemy has the lead. Stay with your partner and take this back!
Opponents lead. Your partner can't do this alone! Fight on!
Your enemy held out just long enough to win. You two should give this another go.
Crimson Days
Opponents have match point, and it doesn't matter. You have your partner!
Opponents have match point. You have each other! Destroy them!
Enemy has match point. And you have your partner. Fight on!
Relationships take work! Brace yourselves!
Working with your partner isn't easy! Believe in yourselves.
Remember: your partner is your life! You can do this!
Both of you fought cautiously, and with sound tactics. Your friendship will go far.
It's tied. Trust your partner. Trust yourself.
Dead even. Assist your partner, and the enemy will fall.
You're evenly matched. Go! Your partner needs you!
The two of you have match point. Show me you still care!
You and your partner have match point. Finish this! Do it for each other!
You and your partner are nearly there! SHOW ME WHAT LOVE LOOKS LIKE.
You and your partner have the lead. Support each other!
You two are leading. Hold onto it.
The two of you are in the lead. Stick together!
Listen. If anyone ever asks you who brought you two together, you tell them it was me.
Your partner thinks like you. Keep it up.
You're in sync with your partner. I love it!
You and your partner move as one. Good.
But soft! What light through yonder window breaks? It is the east, and�`I�f I AM THE CRUCIBLE.
Your partner is your life! Fight with them, not against them!
Watch your partner's back. Their life is your life!
Friendship is a blunt instrument. Use it to crush your enemies!
Welcome to Crimson Days, where we cherish our partners—and annihilate the opposition!
With your partner at your side, nothing—no one—can stop you.
The Crimson Days are here! Show your partner your devotion!
This drill demands that you trust your partner. So trust them!
Show your opponents that love is worth fighting for—dying for!
Love and war! In the Crucible, there is no difference.
I can't argue numbers, you two. Round goes to your opponents.
The enemy outfought the two of you. But it's not over.
You two. Keep your eyes up. Opponents take this round.
I should expect these by now. But I don't.
The numbers favor you and your partner.
Numbers are in. This round goes to the two of you.
You and your partner outfought them.
Can't argue with the numbers. They outfought you.
Your partner has this—trust them.
They came at you with everything they had, but your Crimson Bond proved stronger.
It's rare that Crimson Doubles is fought with such conviction. You and your partner are quite the pair.
You fight with such passion! With such dedication to your partner! I love it!
You two remind me of Lady Efrideet and myself. She was my partner, once. She likes to throw Titans. And some Titans�f like to be thrown.
You two remind me of Lord Saladin and myself. He was my partner, once. No one can best his Fist of Havoc. (Except me.)
The two of you flirt with death as much as with each other. It's disgusting. Keep it up!
Did no one tell you two monsters that Crimson Days are a holiday celebration? You beat the taste out of them. Now do it again!
We began this match proposing a thesis: your partner is your life. And oh, how you rallied to its defense!
Death and destruction follow you two as a matter of course. Good thing you're on our side, or I'd have to deal with you myself.
The dust has settled, and you and your partner stand tall. What is there to stop you when you have each other? Nothing.
Love seems like such a simple thing, until it isn't. But I believe in you, Guardian. Fight again!
Relationships are complex. Or so I'm told. But your effort will pay off. Keep at it!
Cherish your partner, Guardian—no matter the hardship. You can do this!
Love always finds a way, Guardian. Pick yourselves up and try again!
Crimson Days are a time for reverie. Sometimes reverie is deadly. That's fine. Fight again!
"I'm not angry; you're angry!" —is what you should never say to your partner. Fight another match, Guardian!
This is not the end. Do you hear me? The two of you can make this work! One more match!
The best partners support each other through thick and thin. The Crimson Days aren't over—fight again!
This match is over, but there are two of you, and neither of you can actually die. Get back in there and give them hell!
This relationship needs work. But which of us could say that ours do not? Don't give up!
THIS IS WHAT LOVE SOUNDS LIKE!
IS THAT THE SOUND OF YOUR HEART?
Do you hear that? I DO!
I'm sorry to say you and your partner were robbed. It happens to the best of us. Except Ikora.
Show your partner your devotion! Finish this!
A bit of an anticlimax. But you and your partner have won. Cherish each other, and your victory. Because they won't all go that way.
You and your partner faced death and destruction together during these Crimson Days.
The Vanguard and I have done what we could to keep this City safe, but our efforts pale in comparison to yours.
Sometimes the Vanguard are so preoccupied with their own agendas-
they miss the legends of tomorrow rising before their eyes.
Revel in this.
The Crimson Days.
We use these holidays to honor friendship. Camaraderie. Love, for those of us lucky enough to find it.
Today is a celebration! And oh, how I’ve reveled in its making. You and your chosen partner--your Crimson Bond--will take on all comers in my Crucible...
To prove whose bond reigns supreme.
Don’t do it for me, Guardian. Do it for your Crimson Bond.
What is this? Are we having a good time? You didn't even TRY to deploy the Breaker.
Your opponents had to move Heaven and Earth to defeat you. Challenge them again.
You gave it your all, but the enemy vault still stands.
Not that time. Opponents defended their vault.
Not enough. Opponents defended their vault.
Breakthrough.
Breaker calibrated!
Breaker calibration complete!
Breaker ready!
Fall back to vault! The Breaker is lost.
Back up to vault! Opponents have the Breaker!
Withdraw to vault! Enemy has the Breaker!
Enemy deployed Breaker! Defend your vault!
Enemy deployed Breaker! Guard your vault!
I can't argue that one. Your vault's been hacked. That's the match.
Take that vault!
Make that vault yours!
Hack that vault! Hack it!
Opponent's vault hacked! Fantastic.
Your team hacked the opposing vault.
Allies hacked the opposing vault.
The opponents' vault has been hacked. Good.
Allies took the opposing vault. Effective teamwork.
Hooooooold!
You're still alive, so fight!
Plant your feet, and let none pass!
Wait for it�f
Nearly there�f
One moment�f
Hack in progress!
Your vault is exposed! Defend it with your life!
Vault exposed! Defend it! Nothing else matters!
Your vault's vulnerable! Protect it!
Opponents can hack your vault! Defend!
Vault exposed! Protect it at all costs!
Opponents have match point! Think that matters? Fight them.
Enemy has match point! Look them in the eyes and beat them.
Enemy has match point! Defy them!
Opponent's vault exposed! Hack it, or they win!
Opponent's vault exposed! Take it, or face defeat!
Opposing vault exposed! Your only option is to take it!
Your opponents lead. But it's not over.
Opposing team leads. Take it from them!
Opponents have the lead. Break them!
You've deployed the Breaker!
Breaker in flight! Well done!
The Breaker is yours! Now break through!
Your opponents take this one. Plenty of vaults left. Fight another.
The spoils go to your opponents.
I can't argue results. Your opponents out-maneuvered you.
Your opponents proved to be the better thieves.
Your opponents must have some experience in thievery.
I have to give that one to your opponents.
Your opponents have proven they belong on the lawless frontier.
Your opponents have won. But look at it this way: They're embezzlers.
So your opponents are better at swindling than you. That's okay. That's fine.
Those are the drums of war! It all comes to this.
Do you hear it? This is where it ends—for good or ill.
Guardians live for moments like these. Finish it!
Your vault is exposed! Win or lose, the end has come!
Hold strong. The lead is yours!
You have the lead. Keep it.
You're ahead. Stay strong.
Match point! The vault is all you need! Hack it!
Match point. Hack the vault, and the win is yours.
Match point! Take the vault and win!
Not this time. Your vault's been hacked.
Opponents hacked your vault. Get them next time.
Opponents hacked your vault.
Opponents hacked your vault. It's not over!
Opponents took your vault? So what? Keep fighting.
Opposing vault exposed. You want to win? Take it!
Hack the enemy vault, and this match is yours!
You've nearly won. Hack the vault, and this is yours!
They're hacking your vault!
The match is tied. Who will break through?
Dead even. Ties are meant to be broken!
It's tied. Mow through!
Fight to deploy the Breaker, then hack your opponents' vault!
Deploy the Breaker, then hack the opposing vault!
First things first: Deploy that Breaker before your opponents do!
Deploy that Breaker, and you're off to a strong start!
Get to that Breaker and deploy it before your opponents do. Nothing else matters!
Your team deployed the Breaker!
Breaker deployed by your side!
Allies deployed the Breaker!
Your side deployed the Breaker!
Your team has the Breaker!
Vault exposed! Hold the line! Your survival depends on it!
Vault exposed! The line must hold. Fail here, and you concede the match!
Vault exposed! The line must be drawn here! Falter, and your opponent wins!
Good work. Who'd have thought Fallen tech would be such an effective training tool?
And so it ends. The spoils go to you, Guardian.
I see you'll be well-suited to succeed on the lawless frontier. Good.
Excellent. Don't let this training go to waste. You're set to rob the Tangled Shore blind.
You're like a thief in the night. A loud, roaring night. Where everyone has a gun.
When I take the enemy vault, I look them in the eye, and I tell them, "This is mine now." I see you do, too.
I designed Breakthrough to train you in the art of bank robbery. I believe I've succeeded. More or less.
I think you're ready for the lawless frontier. Get out there, and rob the Fallen blind.
What have I created? The Tangled Shore won't know what hit them. But it'll be you.
Opposing vault is ripe for the taking!
Opposing vault exposed! Crush them and hack it!
Opposing vault is vulnerable. Hack it!
Opponent's vault has been exposed! Take it!
Opponent's vault is open to attack. Take it!
Your vault is exposed, but hold the line, and your opponent is finished.
Your vault's exposed, but hold off your enemy, and you take this match!
Your vault's exposed. But you could still take this match. Hold the line!
It's dead even, but the enemy vault is exposed! Take it and end this!
Time's up, and you fought like a demon to keep your vault! Good!
Time's up, and your vault still stands! Superb.
Your team could hold that vault through another Collapse. Well done.
Vault hacked! The spoils of victory are yours!
Vault hacked! The spoils of victory are yours! [pause] You can't actually keep it, though. I need it back for the next match. They only give me so much budget for this.
For a moment there, I thought Death had his bony hand around your throat. But you snapped his arm. You're disgusting.
Neither team could find purchase. Fight them again.
Wasn't convinced by either side. Fight on!
Both teams can do better. Show me.
You hacked the enemy vault. Superb.
You hacked the opposing vault. Impressive.
Enemy vault is yours. Well done.
One minute remains. You're in third!
Thirty seconds left. You're in third!
So many Guardians in the same ring. Loss happens. What you do now is what matters.
In a free-for-all, you can't win every time. Fight again.
Let the sting of this defeat feed your fire.
Defeat is a lesson. Learn it well. Then fight again.
You may be defeated, but you must never surrender.
Embrace the chaos of battle, or you'll never know victory.
Don't be discouraged. There can only be one winner. Come back stronger.
One minute left. You're leading!
You're third. Well fought.
You made third place. Good.
Third place. An excellent match.
Three minutes left. You're in the lead!
First place! You call that a win? I call it a massacre!
You're first. Are you happy? You killed everyone. Don't do this outside the Crucible.
You've taken everything. First place goes to you.
No backup. No allies. Sometimes there's nothing you can do. Fight on just the same.
I can't argue the numbers. Your opponents outscored you.
You've lost--but so have others. You can come back from this.
One minute remains. You're in second!
You're second. Good. Just as Zavala is second to me.
You've made second place. Your lethality is nearly unmatched.
Second place! Not bad. Not bad at all.
Rumble.
Three minutes remain. You're third!
You've shown your might, Guardian. Well fought.
You can fight by my side anytime, Guardian!
Your legend is being  forged in fire, Guardian.
That victory was yours--and yours alone.
No one in that arena could stand against you.
Your spirit is unrivaled. Show me more.
No backup. No allies. No mercy, Guardian.
You're on your own. Every kill, every death, is yours.
No choice but to lone wolf this one.
You against the world, Guardian.
Every Guardian for themselves!
Watch your back, Guardian. No one else will.
Leave none standing.
The enemy is everywhere.
You'll find no allies on this battlefield. Fight hard!
The enemy is all around you.
No one to help you here! Success belongs to you alone!
An opponent is nearing the score limit!
You're in the lead. Score a few more and you have this!
Thirty seconds left. You're leading! Hold fast!
Thirty seconds left. You're in second!
Three minutes. You're in second!
Clash
Hard fought victory, Guardian.
A single victory doesn't win a war, but it's a start. Good work.
Good work, Guardian. Your Light is strong.
Another battle won. On to the next fight.
Impressive, Guardian. You have an instinct for battle.
Remind me to bring you along the next time I feel like brawling.
You've got some fight in you. Good.
No regrets on that one. Well fought.
You showed no remorse. That's how you should be on a battlefield.
Defeat is not surrender, Guardian.
Stand tall, Guardian. This battle is lost, but there will be other fights.
You lost this contest. So what? Fight again!
Guardians are measured by their ability to come back from defeat. So stand. Fight.
Not this time. Fight again whenever you want.
Every battle has a consequence. Sometimes we lose.
You couldn't finish them this time. So what? Plenty of battles left to fight.
The only bad result is a tie. Don't be discouraged.
They defeated you. But there will be other battles.
Execute all targets. And make sure you're still standing when the dust settles.
Nothing complicated here. Defend your allies and defeat your opponents.
Best your opponents and survive. Victory is a matter of will!
Put your enemies down before they do the same to you.
No fancy drills. Just defeat your opponents.
Defeat your enemies. It's all I ask.
This is a gauge of pure combat potential. Make me proud.
Nothing to help you but your team and your weapon. Fight.
They have pried the lead from you! Reclaim it!
The tide has turned in their favor! Fight back!
They have taken the lead! But there's still time to fight!
Don't drop your guard. The enemy is persistent.
Waver, and the enemy will take this! Fight on!
No victory is certain, Guardian. Stand your ground!
Enemy is out of revives! Finish them!
No more second chances for the enemy! End this!
Your enemy is out of revives! Take this fight to them!
Five minutes remain. A strong start! Fight on!
Five minutes left. Keep it up!
The rout is on! Finish it!
You're dominating the field! Don't let up!
If you want it, this battle is yours. TAKE IT.
You're breaking them!
Your opponents are gaining on you!
The enemy wants vengeance! Deny them!
Careful—your enemy is closing the gap!
Three minutes. You're evenly matched!
Three minutes. It's close!
It's neck-and-neck! Show your enemy who has a stronger force of will!
One final push, Guardian. That's all I ask. DO IT.
This is how it starts, Hunter! Nothing but cunning and wit to guide you!
It begins, Titan! Crush them like this every time!
Your time is now, Warlock! Write your legend with each opponent you defeat!
A total rout!
That's a thrashing.
A triumph in tactics.
I know total domination when I see it. Superb!
You obliterated them. I love it!
Ten seconds!
Thirty seconds stand between you and victory!
Thirty seconds remain! Finish them!
It's not over until I sing, Guardian! AND I NEVER SING.
They have stolen the lead!
The enemy has closed the gap!
They have taken your lead! Get it back!
One minute! Hit them hard!
One minute. Time to prove yourself!
This is it!
It's all or nothing!
You trampled them. I love it.
The words "total annihilation" come to mind.
They knew you were coming, and it still looked like you ambushed them.
You caused a total breakdown in their team structure. Well done.
You gave them a drubbing. Total destruction.
I've recorded your session for the rookies. They will have no excuses for sloppy technique.
I have to put up with a lot in this job, Guardian. You make it all worth it.
I told you to fight, and you annihilated them! Good.
Victory! I like you, Guardian. You don't try to be fierce. You just are.
You crushed them! And it is said there's no beauty in destruction.
Tie game. I have no words.
Tie game. I've got nothing.
Tie game. OK, well. How about another?
Tie game.
All right! We'll call it a draw.
I've seen enough! I’m calling this one.
You're pulling ahead! Keep it that way!
Your advantage grows! Stay strong.
You're getting stronger as you fight! I love it!
Keep this up, and the battle is yours!
That can't be right. Really?
What do you expect me to do with that?
What? Where's my catharsis? BOO! BOOOOOO!
I'm, I'm not sure who to be angry at.
I'll admit—I didn't expect this.
Victory imminent!
You're almost there!
Finish them!
One final push, and victory is yours!
Keep it up, and victory is yours!
You're nearly there! Fight on and claim victory!
I can't watch this. Win this already, would you?
JUST WIN THIS, GUARDIAN! OR I'LL SNAP OFF MY OTHER HORN.
Are you trying to kill me? Just win!
Well done! You have the lead!
That's hard fought! The lead is yours!
Well executed! You're leading!
The path to victory is long, but there's always hope! FIGHT!
Their lead has diminished! Keep it up!
A well-fought victory.
Sound tactics bring victory.
Victory is all I ask. Good.
A victory well executed.
I could not ask for a better victory.
Take back what is yours! Their lead means nothing!
*laughs* You're scaring them! Turn this around!
I know this part, Guardian! This is where you come back!
Show them that nothing—NO ONE—can stop you!
Turn this match around, and the Crucible will never forget you!
This is what comebacks are made of! Fight for it!
Gained the lead.
You're in the lead!
You have gained the lead!
One minute. You have this!
One minute. Won't be long now.
You're falling behind!
Lost the lead.
The lead is lost—but the battle is still close.
They have taken the lead—you can turn this tide!
They have the lead! But the match isn't over.
They just took the lead!
Your opponents are pulling away; drag them back!
Your opponents have built a lead. Destroy it!
The enemy has gained ground! But it's not over!
You've lost the lead!
They tried to nail the coffin shut, but you lot just won't stay down! THIS IS YOURS NOW!
This is a comeback for the ages! Make history!
THIS IS WHAT THEY CALL A RIGHTEOUS INFLICTION OF RETRIBUTION.
THEY BATTERED YOUR BODY, BUT THEY COULD NOT HARM YOUR SOUL! NOW CRUSH THEM!
Thirty seconds! Fight on!
Thirty seconds! It's not over!
You're defeated. Fight again. Persistence is key.
Rise from this loss and fight again.
You're beaten—this time.
Your enemy has defeated you.
Defeat comes for us all.
Ten seconds! Bring it home, Guardians.
Ten seconds. TAKE this!
Ten seconds! End them!
They outmatched you this time, Guardians. But victory is a matter of persistence.
A loss is a victory if you learn from it. Make the next opponent pay for this defeat.
No more second chances! Fight till the end!
You're out of revives! Nothing left but to FIGHT!
This is it! All revives spent! Fight on!
Thirty seconds remaining.
You've got thirty seconds!
Thirty seconds!
Five minutes remaining.
Only five minutes left!
Five minutes!
Three minutes remaining.
Three minutes left.
Three minutes!
One minute.
Only one minute left!
One minute left.
Stoke the fire, Guardian! Or they'll take your lead!
The enemy thinks they're mounting a comeback! Stop them!
The enemy doesn't respect your lead! Demand it!
You're in first place!
IT'S TIME, GUARDIAN. Crush them.
YES! Now show them the true meaning of war!
Don't spend all that ammo in one place!
Oh, I can't wait to see what you do with that!
Good! Show your enemy what a real fight looks like!
Good!
[low chuckle]
I love it.
Nice.
What's that you've got?
Oh! Look what you have!
Uh-oh.
Oh no! [laughs]
Now make it rain!
Go! Make them cry.
Overtime! Let's do this.
You're catching up! Close the gap!
I know a comeback when I see one! Fight on!
Fight for vengeance! Take their lead from them!
I knew you could do it! I'd give anything to fight a worthy opponent like you. Someday.
You have the fortitude and persistence of Lord Saladin. You can tell him I said that.
Strong comeback. You make my job worth doing, Guardian.

What I wouldn’t give to fight again beyond the walls. I would tear out a Vex heart with my teeth, I would sear the Cabal with my burning Light, challenge the Fallen Kells to personal combat and scatter them, I—I’ve been watching too many Crucible matches.
Oh my. This is, this is beautiful. You continue to be my greatest success, Guardian.
Guardian to the right of you! Guardian to the left of you! Guardian in FRONT of you! VOLLEYED AND THUNDERED!
The recruits have no excuses. Look at you! At what one Guardian can do! With nothing but your Ghost, your weapon, and your Light!
The Iron Lords. Six Fronts. The Twilight Gap, where Lord Shaxx earned his name. NONE FELLED MORE GUARDIANS THAN YOU.
FIGHT FOREVER, Guardian!
I want more, Guardian!
Fight until there's nothing left!
Let them come! This is their fate!
Relax, Guardian. You're scaring them. They'll never want to match with you again.
I can't believe what I'm seeing!
With ten Hunters like you, I could make the frontier safe again!
Your killing intent is unmatched, Hunter!
With you in the field, no enemy can hide from us, Hunter!
Some people think I don't like Hunters. I don't. I LOVE THEM.
Your strength is an inspiration to us all, Titan!
With ten Titans like you, I could build all seven columns and shake the pillars to their core!
With you on the field, there isn't a border I could not push, Titan!
Call the Praxic Order! Call the Thanatonauts! The Gensym Scribes! Call EVERYONE—so they can witness you!

With ten Warlocks like you, I could turn ideas into weapons!
First blood goes to you. They'll seek retribution for this.
Magnificent! Now stay focused.
Oh, the hounds of war are loose!
Oh, yes! The battle lines have been drawn!
YYEESS!
DELIGHTFUL!
I bet they didn't expect THAT!

Your legend grows!
One after another!
Tell them to line up faster!
This is wonderful!

This is amazing!

I need a Hunter like you with the Redjacks!

I envy your strength, Titan.
You wage war like a true Titan!

THAT shut them down!
You shut the enemy down!

WHAT? WHAT?! HOW?!

OH NOOOO! [laughs]

A fireteam that fights together stays together!
What can stop you if you fight together? Nothing!
Together as one! I love it!
Your team should be glad to have you! Good recoveries!

Good! They can't beat your team if they can't take your crests.
Good! Your allies know you have their backs!

I love it! You turned the tables on defeat!
